revision.text: ==Translingual== ===Etymology=== {{der|mul|NL.|-}} {{m|mul|xeno-}} + {{m|mul|-pus}}, from {{der|mul|grc|ξένος||foreign, strange}} + {{m|grc|πούς||foot}}. Coined by {{w|Johann Georg Wagler}} in [http://www.biodiversitylibrary.org/item/85168#page/393/mode/1up Isis von Oken v.20], 1827, p726. ===Proper noun=== {{taxoninfl|i=1|g=m}} # {{taxon|genus|family|Pipidae|the [[clawed frog]]s}} The best known species is ''[[Xenopus laevis]]'', which is used as a model organism in scientific research. ====Hyponyms==== * {{sense|genus}} See {{w|Xenopus#Species|Xenopus § Species}} on Wikipedia for species. ====Descendants==== * {{desc|en|xenobot}} ===References=== * {{pedia|i=1}} * {{specieslite|i=1}} * {{comcatlite|i=1}}` [[Category:mul:Frogs]]
